lead_paragraph: A grouping of thumbnail sketches last Sunday with an article about the growing influence of South Korean golfers on the L.P.G.A. Tour gave an incorrect identification from the organization for the woman recently elected as the international director on the L.P.G.A. Player Executive Committee. She is Helen Alfredsson of Sweden — not Il Mi Chung, a South Korean golfer who also sought the position.
